1.name: The Man Who Laughs
1.description: When a proud noble refuses to kiss the hand of the despotic King James in 1690, he is cruelly executed and his son surgically disfigured.

2.name: La passion de Jeanne d'Arc
2.description: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

3.name: The Circus
3.description: The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.

4.name: Steamboat Bill, Jr.
4.description: The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew.

5.name: Our Dancing Daughters
5.description: A flapper who's secretly a good girl and a gold digging floozy masquerading as an ingénue both vie for the hand of a millionaire.

6.name: The Crowd
6.description: The life of a man and woman together in a large, impersonal metropolis through their hopes, struggles and downfalls.

7.name: The Last Command
7.description: A former Imperial Russian general and cousin of the Czar ends up in Hollywood as an extra in a movie directed by a former revolutionary.

8.name: Spione
8.description: The mastermind behind a ubiquitous spy operation learns of a dangerous romance between a Russian lady in his employ and a dashing agent from the government's secret service.

9.name: Noah's Ark
9.description: The Biblical story of Noah and the Great Flood, with a parallel story of soldiers in the First World War.

10.name: The Docks of New York
10.description: A blue-collar worker on New York's depressed waterfront finds his life changed after he saves a woman attempting suicide.

11.name: The Cameraman
11.description: Hopelessly in love with a woman working at MGM Studios, a clumsy man attempts to become a motion picture cameraman to be close to the object of his desire.

12.name: Show People
12.description: A young lady from Georgia goes to Hollywood in the hopes of becoming an actress.

13.name: The Farmer's Wife
13.description: After his daughter weds, a middle-aged widower with a profitable farm decides to remarry, but finds choosing a suitable mate a problematic process.

14.name: Speedy
14.description: Harold "Speedy" Swift, a fan of Babe Ruth and the New York Yankees, saves from extinction the city's last horse-drawn trolley, operated by his girlfriend's grandfather.

15.name: Sadie Thompson
15.description: A prostitute seeking a fresh start becomes the obsession of a religious extremist.

16.name: The Wind
16.description: A frail young woman from the east moves in with her cousin in the west, where she causes tension within the family and is slowly driven mad.

17.name: The Patriot
17.description: Paul I, the Emperor of All Russia, becomes the target of a deadly conspiracy.

18.name: A Woman of Affairs
18.description: When two childhood sweethearts are kept from marrying, misery ensues.

19.name: La chute de la maison Usher
19.description: Allan visits the sinister Usher family mansion, where his friend Roderick is painting a portrait of his sickly wife Madeline. The portrait seems to be draining the life out of Madeline, slowly leading to her death.

20.name: The Divine Lady
20.description: The story of the romance between Emma, Lady Hamilton, and British war hero Admiral Horatio Nelson.

21.name: Moulin Rouge
21.description: Parysia is the rage of Paris. She has a daughter, secretly engaged to Andre, and the boy's aristocratic father objects to the alliance because of Margaret's mother being a revue artist. ...                See full summary »

22.name: Alraune
22.description: A scientist interested in the laws of heredity, impregnates a prostitute in a laboratory with the semen of a hanged murderer. The prostitute conceives a female child who has no concept of love, whom the professor adopts.

23.name: Champagne
23.description: A spoiled heiress defies her father by running off to marry her lover. However, Daddy has a few tricks up his sleeve.

24.name: Easy Virtue
24.description: A recently divorced woman hides her scandalous past from her new husband and his family.

25.name: Street Angel
25.description: A woman on the run from the law finds her past catching up to her just as she is on the verge of true happiness.

26.name: White Shadows in the South Seas
26.description: An alcoholic doctor on a Polynesian island, disgusted by white exploitation of the natives, finds himself marooned on a pristinely beautiful island.

27.name: Lonesome
27.description: Two lonely people in the big city meet and enjoy the thrills of an amusement park, only to lose each other in the crowd after spending a great day together. Will they ever see each other again?

28.name: The Racket
28.description: An honest police captain vows to bring down a powerful bootlegger who is protected by corrupt politicians and judges.

29.name: In Old Arizona
29.description: A charming, happy-go-lucky bandit in old Arizona plays cat-and-mouse with the sheriff trying to catch him while he romances a local beauty.

30.name: The Patsy
30.description: An awkward teenager hopelessly in love with her elder sister's boyfriend tries to make him notice her.

31.name: Beggars of Life
31.description: After killing her treacherous step-father, a girl tries to escape the country with a young vagabond. She dresses as a boy, they hop freight trains, quarrel with a group of hobos, and steal ...                See full summary »

32.name: 4 Devils
32.description: Four orphans, raised by an aging clown, becomes a high wire act in a circus.

33.name: The Wedding March
33.description: A young impoverished aristocrat falls in love with an inn-keepers daughter, but has to marry money.

34.name: Lilac Time
34.description: All of those handsome young men in their flying machines are billeted in a field next to the Widow Berthelot's farmhouse in France. Her daughter Jeannine is curious about the young men ...                See full summary »

35.name: Laugh, Clown, Laugh
35.description: A professional clown and a self-indulgent count learn to help each other with their problems, but then become romantic rivals.

36.name: The Last Warning
36.description: A producer decides to reopen a theater, that had been closed five years previously when one of the actors was murdered during a performance, by staging a production of the same play with ...                See full summary »

37.name: Bare Knees
37.description: A young married woman in a small town is visited by her sister, a single "flapper" who causes a scandal in town with her bobbed hair and short skirts. She attracts the attentions of some of...                See full summary »

38.name: West of Zanzibar
38.description: A magician seeks vengeance upon the man who paralyzed him and the illegitimate daughter he sired with the magician's wife.

39.name: The Masks of the Devil
39.description: Baron Reiner, a charming though unscrupulous Viennese aristocrat, becomes infatuated with Virginia, an innocent schoolgirl who is engaged to his best friend, Manfred. In order to seduce the...                See full summary »

40.name: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
40.description: Gold digging blonde Lorelei and her brunette friend Dorothy are searching for rich husbands.

41.name: Zvenigora
41.description: An old Ukrainian man protects and searches for a legendary treasure in the midst of political upheavals.

42.name: Geschlecht in Fesseln
42.description: A young man is convicted of manslaughter and sentenced to a term in prison. There he forms a close relationship with his cellmate and upon his release his wife is concerned as to how prison has changed the man she married.

43.name: The Cossacks
43.description: A peace-loving Cossack chooses to prove himself in battle when his village and childhood sweetheart label him a coward.

44.name: The River
44.description: A naïve young man is working on a logging camp beside a turbulent river. When it closes for winter, he opts to stay for the experience. He meets a woman who was the girlfriend to the boss ...                See full summary »

45.name: Tempest
45.description: In Czarist Russia, a peasant officer, resented by the aristocrats, falls in love with a princess.

46.name: While the City Sleeps
46.description: A tough New York cop is determined to bring down a crook who has always managed to provide an alibi for the crimes he's been accused of, even though the detective knows he's guilty of committing them.

47.name: The Viking
47.description: Vikings compete for power and the love of a woman.

48.name: Four Sons
48.description: A family saga in which three of a Bavarian widow's sons go to war for Germany and the fourth goes to America, Germany's eventual opponent.

49.name: Potomok Chingis-Khana
49.description: In 1918 a simple Mongolian herdsman escapes to the hills after brawling with a western capitalist fur trader who cheats him. In 1920 he helps the partisans fight for the Soviets against the...                See full summary »

50.name: The Mysterious Lady
50.description: An attractive Russian spy seduces an Austrian officer in order to get some important plans, but when she actually falls in love with him, both of them are placed in a dangerous situation.
